Package org.cesecore.keys.token.p11

Class Pkcs11Wrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cesecore.keys.token.p11.Pkcs11Wrapper
  • public class Pkcs11Wrapper
extends Object
    This class wraps sun.security.pkcs11.wrapper.PKCS11, so that we can access the native PKCS11 calls directly. A slot list and token labels for each slot is cached so that C_GetSlotList() only has to be called once and so that C_GetTokenInfo() only has to be called once for each slot. The getInstance(File) method must be called before any PKCS#11 provider is created.
    Version:
    $Id: Pkcs11Wrapper.java 27614 2017-12-21 08:55:51Z bastianf $
